text: howdy Broadway team, as we start getting feedback from True North, I'd like to start assigning some tasks to you. I know we're prepping a build for tomorrow, so my question is would it be preferable if I assign them all to you after tomorrow's build so you're not getting pegged with emails?
only one thing has come back so far, so it's more of a ping than a peg
Please do assign whenever convenient, and I'll try my best to get it in the next build.
